verses.verse: Ἦν <WG1510> Ēn were ( The Plot to Kill Jesus) δὲ <WG1161> de Now τὸ <WG3588> to the πάσχα <WG3957> pascha Passover καὶ <WG2532> kai and τὰ <WG3588> ta the ἄζυμα <WG106> azyma [Feast of] Unleavened Bread ( Literally and the Unleavened; see .) μετὰ <WG3326> meta away , δύο <WG1417> dyo two ἡμέρας <WG2250> hēmeras days καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἐζήτουν <WG2212> ezētoun were looking for οἱ <WG3588> hoi the ἀρχιερεῖς <WG749> archiereis chief priests καὶ <WG2532> kai and οἱ <WG3588> hoi - γραμματεῖς <WG1122> grammateis scribes πῶς <WG4459> pōs way αὐτὸν <WG846> auton [Jesus] ἐν <WG1722> en vvv δόλῳ <WG1388> dolō [a] covert κρατήσαντες <WG2902> kratēsantes to arrest ἀποκτείνωσιν <WG615> apokteinōsin [and] kill [Him] .

ἔλεγον <WG2036> elegon they said , γάρ <WG1063> gar - Μὴ <WG3361> Mē “ [But] not ἐν <WG1722> en during τῇ <WG3588> tē the ἑορτῇ <WG1859> heortē feast , ” μή‿ <WG3361> mē “ or ποτε <WG4219> pote . . . ἔσται <WG1510> estai there may be θόρυβος <WG2351> thorybos a riot τοῦ <WG3588> tou among the λαοῦ <WG2992> laou people . ”

( Jesus Anointed at Bethany) ( ( 470 26:6-13 ; 490 7:36-50 ; 500 12:1-8 )) Καὶ <WG2532> Kai While ὄντος <WG1510> ontos was αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou [Jesus] ἐν <WG1722> en in Βηθανίᾳ <WG963> Bēthania Bethany ἐν <WG1722> en in τῇ <WG3588> tē the οἰκίᾳ <WG3614> oikia home Σίμωνος <WG4613> Simōnos of Simon τοῦ <WG3588> tou the λεπροῦ <WG3015> leprou Leper , ( Aramaic Simon the Potter or Simon the Jar Maker) κατακειμένου <WG2621> katakeimenou reclining at the table αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou vvv ἦλθεν <WG2064> ēlthen came γυνὴ <WG1135> gynē a woman ἔχουσα <WG2192> echousa [with] ἀλάβαστρον <WG211> alabastron an alabaster jar μύρου <WG3464> myrou perfume , νάρδου <WG3487> nardou nard . πιστικῆς <WG4101> pistikēs made of pure πολυτελοῦς <WG4185> polytelous of expensive συντρίψασα <WG4937> syntripsasa She broke open τὴν <WG3588> tēn the ἀλάβαστρον <WG211> alabastron jar κατέχεεν <WG2708> katecheen [and] poured [it] on αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou [Jesus’] τῆς <WG3588> tēs - κεφαλῆς <WG2776> kephalēs head .

Ἦσαν <WG1510> Ēsan those present , δέ <WG1161> de however , τινες <WG5100> tines Some [of] ἀγανακτοῦντες <WG23> aganaktountes expressed their indignation πρὸς <WG4314> pros to ἑαυτούς <WG1438> heautous one another : Εἰς <WG1519> Eis “ Why τί <WG5101> ti . . . ἡ <WG3588> hē - ἀπώλεια <WG684> apōleia waste αὕτη <WG3778> hautē this τοῦ <WG3588> tou of μύρου <WG3464> myrou perfume γέγονεν <WG1096> gegonen - ?

ἠδύνατο <WG1410> ēdynato could γὰρ <WG1063> gar - τοῦτο <WG3778> touto vvv τὸ <WG3588> to vvv μύρον <WG3464> myron [It] πραθῆναι <WG4097> prathēnai have been sold ἐπάνω <WG1883> epanō for over δηναρίων <WG1220> dēnariōn denarii ( A denarius was customarily a day’s wage for a laborer; see .) τριακοσίων <WG5145> triakosiōn three hundred καὶ <WG2532> kai and δοθῆναι <WG1325> dothēnai [the money] given τοῖς <WG3588> tois to the πτωχοῖς <WG4434> ptōchois poor . ” καὶ <WG2532> kai And ἐνεβριμῶντο <WG1690> enebrimōnto they scolded αὐτῇ <WG846> autē her .

Ὁ <WG3588> Ho - δὲ <WG1161> de But Ἰησοῦς <WG2424> Iēsous Jesus εἶπεν <WG2036> eipen said , Ἄφετε <WG863> Aphete “ Leave her alone αὐτήν <WG846> autēn . . . ; τί <WG5101> ti why αὐτῇ <WG846> autē her ? κόπους <WG2873> kopous . . . παρέχετε <WG3930> parechete are you bothering καλὸν <WG2570> kalon a beautiful ἔργον <WG2041> ergon deed ἠργάσατο <WG2038> ērgasato She has done ἐν <WG1722> en to ἐμοί <WG1473> emoi Me .

ὃ <WG3739> ho what ἔσχεν <WG2192> eschen she could ἐποίησεν <WG4160> epoiēsen She has done προέλαβεν <WG4301> proelaben in advance μυρίσαι <WG3462> myrisai to anoint τὸ <WG3588> to - σῶμά <WG4983> sōma body μου <WG1473> mou My εἰς <WG1519> eis of τὸν <WG3588> ton [My] ἐνταφιασμόν <WG1780> entaphiasmon burial .

( Judas Agrees to Betray Jesus) ( ( 470 26:14-16 ; 490 22:3-6 )) Καὶ <WG2532> Kai Then Ἰούδας <WG2455> Ioudas Judas Ἰσκαριὼθ <WG2469> Iskariōth Iscariot , ὁ <WG3588> ho - εἷς <WG1520> heis one τῶν <WG3588> tōn of the δώδεκα <WG1427> dōdeka Twelve , ἀπῆλθεν <WG565> apēlthen went πρὸς <WG4314> pros to τοὺς <WG3588> tous the ἀρχιερεῖς <WG749> archiereis chief priests ἵνα <WG2443> hina to αὐτὸν <WG846> auton [Jesus] παραδοῖ <WG3860> paradoi betray αὐτοῖς <WG846> autois to them .

οἱ <WG3588> hoi - δὲ <WG1161> de - ἀκούσαντες <WG191> akousantes to hear [this] , ἐχάρησαν <WG5463> echarēsan They were delighted καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἐπηγγείλαντο <WG1861> epēngeilanto they promised αὐτῷ <WG846> autō him ἀργύριον <WG694> argyrion money . δοῦναι <WG1325> dounai to give καὶ <WG2532> kai So ἐζήτει <WG2212> ezētei [Judas] began to look for πῶς <WG4459> pōs vvv αὐτὸν <WG846> auton [Jesus] . εὐκαίρως <WG2122> eukairōs an opportunity παραδοῖ <WG3860> paradoi to betray

( Preparing the Passover) ( ( 470 26:17-19 ; 490 22:7-13 )) Καὶ <WG2532> Kai - τῇ <WG3588> tē On the πρώτῃ <WG4413> prōtē first ἡμέρᾳ <WG2250> hēmera day τῶν <WG3588> tōn - ἀζύμων <WG106> azymōn of the Feast of Unleavened [Bread] , ( Literally On the first day of the Unleavened; see .) ὅτε <WG3753> hote when τὸ <WG3588> to the πάσχα <WG3957> pascha Passover lamb ἔθυον <WG2380> ethyon was to be sacrificed , λέγουσιν <WG3004> legousin asked αὐτῷ <WG846> autō Him , οἱ <WG3588> hoi - μαθηταὶ <WG3101> mathētai disciples αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou [Jesus’] Ποῦ <WG4226> Pou “ Where θέλεις <WG2309> theleis do You want ἀπελθόντες <WG565> apelthontes vvv ἑτοιμάσωμεν <WG2090> hetoimasōmen us to prepare ἵνα <WG2443> hina for φάγῃς <WG5315> phagēs You to eat τὸ <WG3588> to the πάσχα <WG3957> pascha Passover ? ”

Καὶ <WG2532> Kai So ἀποστέλλει <WG649> apostellei He sent δύο <WG1417> dyo two τῶν <WG3588> tōn of μαθητῶν <WG3101> mathētōn disciples αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou His καὶ <WG2532> kai and λέγει <WG3004> legei told αὐτοῖς <WG846> autois them , Ὑπάγετε <WG5217> Hypagete “ Go εἰς <WG1519> eis into τὴν <WG3588> tēn the πόλιν <WG4172> polin city , καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἀπαντήσει <WG528> apantēsei will meet ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin you . ἄνθρωπος <WG444> anthrōpos a man κεράμιον <WG2765> keramion a jug ὕδατος <WG5204> hydatos of water βαστάζων <WG941> bastazōn carrying ἀκολουθήσατε <WG190> akolouthēsate Follow αὐτῷ <WG846> autō him ,

( The Last Supper) ( ( 470 26:20-30 ; 490 22:14-23 ; 530 11:17-34 )) Καὶ <WG2532> Kai When ὀψίας <WG3798> opsias evening γενομένης <WG1096> genomenēs came , ἔρχεται <WG2064> erchetai [Jesus] arrived μετὰ <WG3326> meta with τῶν <WG3588> tōn the δώδεκα <WG1427> dōdeka Twelve .

ὅτι <WG3754> hoti - ὁ <WG3588> ho The μὲν <WG3303> men vvv Υἱὸς <WG5207> Huios Son τοῦ <WG3588> tou - ἀνθρώπου <WG444> anthrōpou of Man ὑπάγει <WG5217> hypagei will go καθὼς <WG2531> kathōs just as γέγραπται <WG1125> gegraptai it is written περὶ <WG4012> peri about αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou Him , οὐαὶ <WG3759> ouai woe δὲ <WG1161> de but τῷ <WG3588> tō - ἀνθρώπῳ <WG444> anthrōpō man ἐκείνῳ <WG1565> ekeinō to that δι’ <WG1223> di’ by οὗ <WG3739> hou whom ὁ <WG3588> ho [He] Υἱὸς <WG5207> Huios . . . τοῦ <WG3588> tou . . . ἀνθρώπου <WG444> anthrōpou . . . παραδίδοται <WG3860> paradidotai is betrayed ! καλὸν <WG2570> kalon [It would be] better αὐτῷ <WG846> autō for him εἰ <WG1487> ei if οὐκ <WG3756> ouk vvv ἐγεννήθη <WG1080> egennēthē had not been born . ” ὁ <WG3588> ho - ἄνθρωπος <WG444> anthrōpos [he] ἐκεῖνος <WG1565> ekeinos -

Καὶ <WG2532> Kai - ἐσθιόντων <WG2068> esthiontōn While they were eating , αὐτῶν <WG846> autōn vvv λαβὼν <WG2983> labōn [Jesus] took ἄρτον <WG740> arton bread , εὐλογήσας <WG2127> eulogēsas spoke a blessing ἔκλασεν <WG2806> eklasen [and] broke it , καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἔδωκεν <WG1325> edōken gave [it] αὐτοῖς <WG846> autois to [the disciples] , καὶ <WG2532> kai - εἶπεν <WG2036> eipen saying , Λάβετε <WG2983> Labete “ Take [it] ; τοῦτό <WG3778> touto this ἐστιν <WG1510> estin is τὸ <WG3588> to - σῶμά <WG4983> sōma body . ” μου <WG1473> mou My

Καὶ <WG2532> Kai Then λαβὼν <WG2983> labōn He took ποτήριον <WG4221> potērion the cup , εὐχαριστήσας <WG2168> eucharistēsas gave thanks , ἔδωκεν <WG1325> edōken [and] gave it αὐτοῖς <WG846> autois to them , καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἔπιον <WG4095> epion they all drank ἐξ <WG1537> ex from αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou it . πάντες <WG3956> pantes vvv

καὶ <WG2532> kai - εἶπεν <WG2036> eipen He said αὐτοῖς <WG846> autois to them , Τοῦτό <WG3778> Touto “ This ἐστιν <WG1510> estin is τὸ <WG3588> to - αἷμά <WG129> haima blood μου <WG1473> mou My τῆς <WG3588> tēs of the διαθήκης <WG1242> diathēkēs covenant , ( BYZ and TR the new covenant) τὸ <WG3588> to which ἐκχυννόμενον <WG1632> ekchynnomenon is poured out ὑπὲρ <WG5228> hyper for πολλῶν <WG4183> pollōn many .

ἀμὴν <WG281> amēn Truly λέγω <WG3004> legō I tell ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin you ὅτι <WG3754> hoti - , οὐκέτι <WG3765> ouketi . . . οὐ <WG3756> ou vvv μὴ <WG3361> mē vvv πίω <WG4095> piō I will no longer drink ἐκ <WG1537> ek of τοῦ <WG3588> tou the γενήματος <WG1081> genēmatos fruit τῆς <WG3588> tēs of the ἀμπέλου <WG288> ampelou vine ἕως <WG2193> heōs until τῆς <WG3588> tēs - ἡμέρας <WG2250> hēmeras day ἐκείνης <WG1565> ekeinēs that ὅταν <WG3752> hotan when αὐτὸ <WG846> auto it πίνω <WG4095> pinō I drink καινὸν <WG2537> kainon anew ἐν <WG1722> en in τῇ <WG3588> tē the βασιλείᾳ <WG932> basileia kingdom τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou of God . ”

Καὶ <WG2532> Kai And ὑμνήσαντες <WG5214> hymnēsantes when they had sung a hymn , ἐξῆλθον <WG1831> exēlthon they went out εἰς <WG1519> eis to τὸ <WG3588> to the ὄρος <WG3735> oros Mount τῶν <WG3588> tōn - Ἐλαιῶν <WG1636> Elaiōn of Olives .

( Jesus Predicts Peter’s Denial) ( ( 450 13:7-9 ; 470 26:31-35 ; 490 22:31-38 ; 500 13:36-38 )) Καὶ <WG2532> Kai Then λέγει <WG3004> legei said αὐτοῖς <WG846> autois to them , ὁ <WG3588> ho - Ἰησοῦς <WG2424> Iēsous Jesus ὅτι <WG3754> hoti - Πάντες <WG3956> Pantes vvv σκανδαλισθήσεσθε <WG4624> skandalisthēsesthe “ You will all fall away , ( BYZ and TR include on account of Me this night; see .) ὅτι <WG3754> hoti for γέγραπται <WG1125> gegraptai it is written : Πατάξω <WG3960> Pataxō ‘ I will strike τὸν <WG3588> ton the ποιμένα <WG4166> poimena Shepherd , Καὶ <WG2532> Kai and τὰ <WG3588> ta the πρόβατα <WG4263> probata sheep διασκορπισθήσονται <WG1287> diaskorpisthēsontai will be scattered .’ ( )

Ἀλλὰ <WG235> Alla But μετὰ <WG3326> meta after τὸ <WG3588> to - ἐγερθῆναί <WG1453> egerthēnai I have risen , με <WG1473> me I προάξω <WG4254> proaxō will go ahead of ὑμᾶς <WG4771> hymas you εἰς <WG1519> eis into τὴν <WG3588> tēn - Γαλιλαίαν <WG1056> Galilaian Galilee . ”

Ὁ <WG3588> Ho - δὲ <WG1161> de - Πέτρος <WG4074> Petros Peter ἔφη <WG5346> ephē declared αὐτῷ <WG846> autō . . . , Εἰ <WG1487> Ei if καὶ <WG2532> kai “ Even πάντες <WG3956> pantes all σκανδαλισθήσονται <WG4624> skandalisthēsontai fall away , ἀλλ’ <WG235> all’ vvv οὐκ <WG3756> ouk never [will] . ” ἐγώ <WG1473> egō I
